channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ukraine Says It Struck 2 Russian Oil Depots
item.description: Kyiv is pressing its drone campaign while lobbying allies for permission to use weapons supplied by NATO countries for strikes deep inside Russia.

item.title: Battling Mpox in the Outbreak’s Epicenter
item.description: The New York Times visited a remote hospital in Congo where children and adults suffer with mpox, recently declared a global health emergency.

item.title: Push for Gender Equality in E.U.’s Top Roles Looks Set to Fall Short
item.description: Ursula von der Leyen, the European Commission president, asked member countries to nominate both men and women for commission roles.

item.title: Tropical Storm Shanshan Drenches Southern Japan, Disrupting Train and Air Travel
item.description: The storm weakened after making landfall as a typhoon but still posed the risk of landslides and floods. More than four million people were under evac...

item.title: Sahra Wagenknecht Is Shaking Up German Politics From the East
item.description: Sahra Wagenknecht, a former Communist, has founded her own party to respond to German grievances about migrants, crime and the dangers of the war in U...

item.title: Ukraine Says It Struck 2 Russian Oil Depots
item.description: Kyiv is pressing its drone campaign while lobbying allies for permission to use weapons supplied by NATO countries for strikes deep inside Russia.

item.title: Asian American Actors Are Finally Getting Romantic Lead Roles
item.description: Western pop culture, past and present, has often emasculated Asian male characters. A new crop of roles are starting to offer alternatives.

item.title: Middle East Crisis: Israel Kills Militant Leader in 2nd Day of West Bank Raid
item.description: Palestinian militants confirmed the death of a commander in the city of Tulkarm. The Times had interviewed the commander, who said he gained “courage”...

item.title: Trump Campaign Filming at Arlington Cemetery Dismayed Family of Green Beret
item.description: The family of a Green Beret buried there expressed concern about videos and photos taken by his grave. And a cemetery employee declined to press charg...

item.title: Push for Gender Equality in E.U.’s Top Roles Looks Set to Fall Short
item.description: Ursula von der Leyen, the European Commission president, asked member countries to nominate both men and women for commission roles.
